alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Loup; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 10:56PM CDT until June 30 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHERRY...ROCK...NORTHERN LOUP...BROWN AND NORTHERN BLAINE COUNTIES... At 1055 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Johnstown to 11 miles east of Elsmere to 9 miles north of Brewster, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Bassett, Long Pine, Newport, Johnstown, Purdum, Rose, Elsmere, Hofeld Lake, Fox Bayou, Raven, Twin Lakes, Willow Lake, Duff, Koshopah, Pine Glen, Antelope Peak, Sybrant, Moon Lake and Long Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 136 and 203. Highway 20 between mile markers 224 and 273. Highway 83 between mile markers 179 and 190. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
